glsa.title: Distrobox: Arbitrary Code Execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Distrobox, which can lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: Use any Linux distribution inside your terminal. Enable both backward and forward compatibility with software and freedom to use whatever distribution youâ€™re more comfortable with. Distrobox uses podman, docker or lilipod to create containers using the Linux distribution of your choice. The created container will be tightly integrated with the host, allowing sharing of the HOME directory of the user, external storage, external USB devices and graphical apps (X11/Wayland), and audio.
